verses.text: And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; and all the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w* him, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* at \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*.

And \add there was\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in \w Maon|strong="H4584"\w*, whose \w possessions|strong="H4639"\w* \add were\add* in \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*; and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add was\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and he had \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*: and he was \w shearing|strong="H1494"\w* his \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* in \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*.\f + \fr 25.2 \ft possessions: or, business\f*

Now the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add was\add* \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*; and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w*: and \add she was\add* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* of \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w*, and of a \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w countenance|strong="H8389"\w*: but the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add was\add* \w churlish|strong="H7186"\w* and \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in his \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*; and he \add was\add* of the house of \w Caleb|strong="H3614"\w*.
¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* that \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* did \w shear|strong="H1494"\w* his \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, Get you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*, and \w greet|strong="H7592"\w* him in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:\f + \fr 25.5 \ft greet…: Heb. ask him in my name of peace\f*

And thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to him that \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w* \add in prosperity\add*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* both to thee, and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* to thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add be\add* unto all that thou hast.

And now I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that thou hast \w shearers|strong="H1494"\w*: now thy \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* which were with us, we \w hurt|strong="H3637"\w* them not, neither was there \w ought|strong="H3972"\w* \w missing|strong="H6485"\w* unto them, all the \w while|strong="H3117"\w* they were in \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*.\f + \fr 25.7 \ft hurt: Heb. shamed\f*

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* thy young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, and they will \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee. Wherefore let the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: for we \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w give|strong="H5414"\w*, I pray thee, whatsoever \w cometh|strong="H4672"\w* to thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and to thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And when \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* according to all those \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w ceased|strong="H5117"\w*.\f + \fr 25.9 \ft ceased: Heb. rested\f*

¶ And \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*? and who \add is\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*? there be \w many|strong="H7231"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* now a \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that break \w away|strong="H6555"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*.

Shall I then \w take|strong="H3947"\w* my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and my \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and my \w flesh|strong="H2878"\w* that I have \w killed|strong="H2873"\w* for my \w shearers|strong="H1494"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* unto \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, whom I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not whence they \add be\add*?\f + \fr 25.11 \ft flesh: Heb. slaughter\f*

So \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and went \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him all those \w sayings|strong="H1697"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, Gird ye \w on|strong="H2296"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. And they girded \w on|strong="H2296"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* also girded \w on|strong="H2296"\w* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: and there went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* about \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* by the \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w*.

¶ But \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w*, \w Nabal’s|strong="H5037"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* out of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* to \w salute|strong="H1288"\w* our \w master|strong="H0113"\w*; and he \w railed|strong="H5860"\w* on them.\f + \fr 25.14 \ft railed…: Heb. flew upon them\f*

But the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add were\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto us, and we were not \w hurt|strong="H3637"\w*, neither \w missed|strong="H6485"\w* we any \w thing|strong="H3972"\w*, as long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* we were \w conversant|strong="H1980"\w* with them, when we were in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*:\f + \fr 25.15 \ft hurt: Heb. shamed\f*

They were a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* unto us both by \w night|strong="H3915"\w* and \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, all the \w while|strong="H3117"\w* we were with them \w keeping|strong="H7462"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

Now therefore \w know|strong="H3045"\w* and \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* what thou wilt \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* is \w determined|strong="H3615"\w* against our \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, and against all his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*: for he \add is such\add* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, that \add a man\add* cannot \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to him.

¶ Then \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* made \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w bottles|strong="H5035"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* ready \w dressed|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w measures|strong="H5429"\w* of \w parched|strong="H7039"\w* \add corn\add*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* clusters of \w raisins|strong="H6778"\w*, and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cakes|strong="H1690"\w* of figs, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* on \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*.\f + \fr 25.18 \ft clusters: or, lumps\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, Go \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me; behold, I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you. But she \w told|strong="H5046"\w* not her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*.

And it was \add so, as\add* she \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* on the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, that she came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* by the \w covert|strong="H5643"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, and, behold, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* her; and she \w met|strong="H6298"\w* them.

Now \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely in \w vain|strong="H8267"\w* have I \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* all that \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \add fellow\add* hath in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, so that \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w* was \w missed|strong="H6485"\w* of all that \add pertained\add* unto him: and he hath \w requited|strong="H7725"\w* me \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* and \w more|strong="H3254"\w* also \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* unto the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, if I \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* of all that \add pertain\add* to him \w by|strong="H5704"\w* the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* any that \w pisseth|strong="H8366"\w* against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*.

And when \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, she \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w*, and lighted \w off|strong="H3381"\w* the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H0639"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* on her \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* herself to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*,

And \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* at his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Upon me, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \add upon\add* me \add let this\add* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \add be:\add* and let thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, I pray thee, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in thine \w audience|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H0589"\w*.\f + \fr 25.24 \ft audience: Heb. ears\f*

\w Let|strong="H7760"\w* not my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, I pray thee, \w regard|strong="H3820"\w* this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, \add even\add* \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*: for as his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add*, so \add is\add* he; \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w folly|strong="H5039"\w* \add is\add* with him: but I thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* not the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, whom thou didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 25.25 \ft regard: Heb. lay it to his heart\f*\f + \fr 25.25 \ft Nabal: that is, Fool\f*

Now therefore, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \add as\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, seeing the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w withholden|strong="H4513"\w* thee from \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* to \add shed\add* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and from \w avenging|strong="H3467"\w* thyself with thine own \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, now let thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and they that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* to my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, be as \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*.  +  r 25.26  t avenging…: Heb. saving thyself *

And now this \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* which thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, let it even be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* that \w follow|strong="H1980"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.\f + \fr 25.27 \ft blessing: or, present\f*\f + \fr 25.27 \ft follow…: Heb. walk at the feet of, etc\f*

I pray thee, \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* the \w trespass|strong="H6588"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w certainly|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* a \w sure|strong="H0539"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; because my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w fighteth|strong="H3898"\w* the \w battles|strong="H4421"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* hath not been \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in thee \add all\add* thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

Yet a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* is \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* to \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* thee, and to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: but the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* shall be \w bound|strong="H6887"\w* in the \w bundle|strong="H6872"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, them shall he sling \w out|strong="H7049"\w*, \add as out\add* of the \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w sling|strong="H7050"\w*.\f + \fr 25.29 \ft as out…: Heb. in the midst of the bought of a sling\f*

And it shall come to pass, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* according to all the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* concerning thee, and shall have \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

That this shall be no \w grief|strong="H6330"\w* unto thee, nor \w offence|strong="H4383"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* unto my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, either that thou hast \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w causeless|strong="H2600"\w*, or that my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w avenged|strong="H3467"\w* himself: but when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall have dealt \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, then \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*.\f + \fr 25.31 \ft no grief: Heb. no staggering, or, stumbling\f*

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* me:

And \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* thy \w advice|strong="H2940"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* thou, which hast \w kept|strong="H3607"\w* me this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* to \add shed\add* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and from \w avenging|strong="H3467"\w* myself with mine own \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

For in very \w deed|strong="H0199"\w*, \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, which hath kept me \w back|strong="H4513"\w* from \w hurting|strong="H7489"\w* thee, \w except|strong="H3884"\w* thou hadst \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w* and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* me, surely there had not been \w left|strong="H3498"\w* unto \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* by the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* any that \w pisseth|strong="H8366"\w* against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* of her \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add that\add* which she had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and have \w accepted|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w person|strong="H6440"\w*.

¶ And \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*; and, behold, he held a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, like the \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* of a \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; and \w Nabal’s|strong="H5037"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add was\add* \w merry|strong="H2896"\w* within him, for he \add was\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w*: wherefore she \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w less|strong="H6996"\w* or \w more|strong="H1419"\w*, until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.

But it came to pass in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, when the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* was gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*, and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* had \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, that his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* him, and he became \add as\add* a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

And it came to pass about \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add after\add*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5062"\w* \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*, that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that hath \w pleaded|strong="H7378"\w* the \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* of my \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w*, and hath \w kept|strong="H2820"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w*, to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* her to him to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And when the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* to \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto her, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* us unto thee, to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee to him to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And she \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* herself on \add her\add* \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \add let\add* thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \add be\add* a \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* to \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

And \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w*, and \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* upon an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, with \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w damsels|strong="H5291"\w* of hers that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H7272"\w* her; and she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and became his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 25.42 \ft after her: Heb. at her feet\f*

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* also \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*; and they were also \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them his \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.

¶ But \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, to \w Phalti|strong="H6406"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Laish|strong="H3919"\w*, which \add was\add* of \w Gallim|strong="H1554"\w*.\f + \fr 25.44 \ft Phalti: also called, Phaltiel\f*
